title: Art Deco Studio appt in Abbesses / Montmartre
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Located in the Abbesses/Montmartre area, this clean and cosy studio is on the 3rd floor of a beautiful fully renovated Art Deco building (built in 1933). A beautiful ancient elevator is perfectly working.

Very bright studio composed of 1 main room with a convertible sofa (suitable for 2 people), a small kitchen, a bathroom with a shower and real WC and a small entrance.

Very secured building as it has a door code, CCTV and a building caretaker living there. The building was nowadays a hotel owned by the Moulin Rouge owner who had the dancers stay there. Internet included but no laundry washing machine.

The studio is 2mn walking distance from Abbesses metro station (line 12) and 3mn walking distance from Pigalle metro station (line 2 and 12), and bus station (line 30, 54, 67 and Montmatrobus).

The rent is 900€/month. Available from April 1st
